attributes.action: call upon all candidates seeking election as local authority councillors to make public their tax records for the last ten years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The purpose of this petition is to provide the electorate of this country with information about the individuals that seek election to local councils and who have responsibility for setting council tax rates and local authority charges.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
